name: The Seven Salty Seas
description:
Embark on a daring journey through a randomly generated world, build your mighty sea-borne empire, slay mighty beasts that lurk in the waters, and defeat the other guilds in a race to dominate the sea. This game is currently in development, and will be released in a pre-alpha state soon. To get updates for this game, and to be ready for the pre-alpha, please add my game to your collection. 

  • Randomly Generated Worlds^
  • Classic RTS Controls
  • Fight Monsters that Dwell in the Sea*
  • Manage a Fleet of Ships^
  • Compete against enemy Guilds*
  • Micromanage Every Last Detail of Your Boats*
  • Build towns to help increase profits*
  • Fight in Naval battles against other ships*
  • Mod Support*

* = Not Yet Implemented

^ = Partially Implemented

  • Devlog #1
